name: ReMoDDeD
savepath: This update includes a lot of fixes for the previous update as well as some mapping adjustments and global item changes. Sprinkle in a few new items, mercenary improvements and skill tweaks and we got ourselves an update. I strongly recommend you create a new character and/or regenerate items to avoid any conflicts from older configurations. Sorry for the hassle, but please enjoy the update and thanks for your patience!

I would like to take the time to officially say thank you for everyone's continued patience and support during this 'slow time' as I bounce back from my health issues. I feel guilty enough as-is, so I appreciate that it's not coming from you guys also, heh. You guys are rockstars as always, and I hope to continue normal development pacing soon!
